item.description:
We have a special "extra" meetup this month to visit member Stacey Collins at her family's home in South Portland. We will have an opportunity to see and discuss the Collins' backyard chicken operation, talk about the pros and cons of various approaches, and get inspired to bring chickens into our own backyards!

Mini tour and discussion starting at 6:30.
Potluck and more discussion starting around 7:15.

Please bring your potluck kit (plate/bowl/utensils/napkin/cup) and a lawn chair (there are a limited number of seats and the ground might not be suitable due to, um, free ranging chickens:)

This event is weather-permitting! Cancelled in the event of rain.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Special Meetup: Backyard Chickens Show-and-Tell
